name: 2x0ng
description: Pronounced "TOO-zong", 2x0ng is my fun puzzle game, the sequel to Xong. Match colors to unlock new areas of each procedurally generated level while defeating enemies with your bouncing Squareball. 2x0ng is also Free Software, written entirely in Common Lisp. You can learn more about the game at http://xelf.me/2x0ng.html or download the game below.
